title: Tennessee State Income Tax Calculator | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For tax years 2021–2025: TN State Tax Rate: r = 0 LaTeX: 1) Total Income Considered: I_c = W + I + D 2) State Tax: T_{TN} = I_c × r = (W + I + D) × 0 = 0 3) Effective Rate: ER = { T_{TN} \over \max(I_c, 1) } × 100%

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
